title: Remove branch management links to create clean Development Task interface
description: Eliminate Branch, PR created and ready for development, and Rebase links from the Development Task UI to reduce visual clutter and create a streamlined, focused interface that prioritizes core task management functionality
iWant: to remove Branch, PR created, and Rebase links from the Development Task interface
soThat: I can have a simple and clean task management experience without unnecessary branch operation distractions
acceptanceCriteria: Branch link is completely removed from Development Task UI
PR created and ready for development link is eliminated
Rebase link is removed from the interface
Development Task core functionality remains unaffected
